title: Gorgeous Studio Apt.
map_address: 1900 W. Cullom Ave. near 4302 N. Wolcott Ave
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   1908-12 W. Cullom Ave, A must see 2 1/2 room studio apartment with a separate eat-in kitchen and a walk out balcony located on a walk up 2nd  floor overlooking courtyard. Updated eat in kitchen.  Gated back porch in courtyard bldg. Large closet space and hardwood floors.  Back porch, laundry and storage in basement. $870.00 with heat. Available July 1, 2022.  Close to transportation, restaurants and shopping.  No dogs.(847)581-0082
